Port.name: initial
Port.description: the initial value for the model

Port.name: infec
Port.description: the proportion of people that are infected with COVID-19 in a cell

Port.name: rec
Port.description: the proportion of people that are recovered from COVID-19 in a cell

Port.name: sus
Port.description: the proportion of people that are susceptible to COVID-19 in a cell

Port.name: infec_a
Port.description: the proportion of people that are infected with asymptomatic COVID-19 in a cell

Port.name: infec_show
Port.description: the proportion of people that are infected with symptomatic COVID-19 in a cell
